description: Client name.
name: __client_name

description: Source name.
name: __source_name

description: Schema version.
name: __schema_version

description: Event timestamp.
name: __event_timestamp

description: Id of picking session.
name: id

description: Quantity that was picked during the session. 0 if session type is `not-picked`.
name: amount

description: Address inside MFC from where item was picked. Null if session type is `not-picked`.
name: picking_address

description: Product id that was picked.
name: item_id

description: Creation timestamp of picking session.
name: created_time

description: Actual weight for variable weight items that was piked during the session.
name: weights

description: Session type. Could be one of `picked`, `not-picked`.
name: type

description: List of actual barcodes that was scanned during picking session.
name: barcodes

description: Id of the tote to where item was picked. Null id session type is `not-picked`
name: tote_id

description: MFC location id where picking session was performed.
name: location_id

description: Id of the order for what item was picked.
name: order_id

description: Device serial number.
name: device_serial_number
user
description: Identification data of the user that created the manual picking decision
Requested item quantity.
name: quantity_unit_to_prepare

description: Source system Pub/Sub message id (use in case of pubsub2pubsub pattern)
name: pubsub_message_id

description: Timestamp when message was published to topic.
name: pubsub_publish_time

description: Message attributes.
name: attributes
__ingest_timestamp
description: BigQuery ingestion timestamp

name: __publish_timestamp
description: PubSub publish timestamp

name: __pubsub_message_id
description: ID of the message assigned by PubSub
